attributes.action: Remove the BBC licence fee. BBC to compete in an open market for funding.
attributes.additional_details:
Question Time. Enough said.
Cambridge Analytica
Nigel Farage appearances on QT
Boris Johnson
Brexit
attributes.background: The BBC has conspicuously under-reported or misreported many issues of the day on BBC News and BBC Radio4, particularly the Today programme. Question Time is dominated by guests from minority viewpoints, with an audience that is screened to ensure the programme appears to represent a majority view.
